name: SOUTH COAST 25 (ROBERTS)
notes:
Cruising 'trailer sailor', built and seen mostly in Australia (NSW) 
Based on the earlier ROBERTS 25 with modifications by the Builder.
Available also with lifting keel: Draft 1.31' KU; 5.25' KD. 
Also a fixed keel version: Draft 4.66'.
Delivered ready to sail or in varying stages of completion.
South Coast Yachts
Wolongong
NSW
